items.name: Eye Rays
entries: Emo schießt drei der folgenden magischen Augenstrahlen nach dem Zufallsprinzip (Duplikate werden neu gewürfelt) und wählt dabei ein bis drei Ziele aus, die er im Umkreis von 120 Fuß sehen kann:

items.name: 1. Happiness Ray
entries: The targeted creature must succeed on a {@dc 14} Wisdom saving throw or fall {@condition prone} with laughter, becoming {@condition incapacitated} and unable to stand up for 1 minute or until Emo harms the creature. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

items.name: 2. Sadness Ray
entries: The targeted creature must succeed on a {@dc 15} Intelligence saving throw. On a failed save, the target is overcome by sorrow and takes {@damage 3d6} psychic damage, and it can't take a reaction until the end of its next turn. On its next turn, it can use either an action or a bonus action, not both. On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage and suffers none of the other effects.

items.name: 3. Anger Ray
entries: The targeted creature must succeed on a {@dc 14} Wisdom saving throw or be compelled to duel with Emo for 1 minute. The target has disadvantage on attack rolls against creatures other than Emo and must make a Wisdom saving throw each time it attempts to move more than 30 feet away from Emo.

items.name: 4. Anxiety Ray
entries: The targeted creature must succeed on a {@dc 15} Intelligence saving throw or lose the ability to distinguish friend from foe, regarding all creatures it can see as enemies for 1 minute. Each time the target takes damage, it can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Immer wenn die betroffene Kreatur eine andere Kreatur mit einem Angriff, Zauber oder einer anderen Fähigkeit angreift, muss sie das Ziel zufällig unter den Kreaturen wählen, die sie innerhalb der Reichweite des Angriffs, Zaubers oder der anderen Fähigkeit, die sie benutzt, sehen kann. Wenn ein Feind einen Gelegenheitsangriff der betroffenen Kreatur provoziert, muss die Kreatur diesen Angriff ausführen, wenn sie dazu in der Lage ist.

items.name: 5. Fear Ray
entries: The targeted creature must succeed on a {@dc 14} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} for 1 minute.
The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

items.name: 6. Desolation Ray
entries: The targeted creature must succeed on a {@dc 14} Intelligence saving throw. On a successful save, the target takes {@damage 5d10} psychic damage, and the spell ends. On a failed save, the target takes {@damage 5d10} psychic damage and perceives itself to be confined within an illusory stone cell for 1 minute. The target can't see or hear anything beyond the cell and is {@condition restrained}.

items.name: 7. Jealousy Ray
entries: The targeted creature must succeed on a {@dc 14} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition charmed} for 1 minute. While the target is {@condition charmed} in this way, it must use its action before moving on each of its turns to make a melee attack against a creature that Emo chooses. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

items.name: 8. Disgusting Ray
entries: The targeted creature must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw against poison. On a failed save, the target is enveloped in sphere of yellow, nauseating gas and spends its action on its next turn retching and reeling.

items.name: 9. Surprise Ray
entries: Die anvisierte Kreatur muss einen Erfolg bei einem
{@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw or be {@condition blinded} by a spray of color until the end of its next turn.

items.name: 10. Trust Ray
entries: Die anvisierte Kreatur muss einen Erfolg bei einem
{@dc 16} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition charmed} by Emo for 1 hour or until Emo harms the creature.

trait.name: Brave
entries: Mr. Greystone has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition frightened}.

trait.name: Brute
entries: Eine Nahkampfwaffe verursacht einen zusätzlichen Würfel ihres Schadens, wenn Mr. Greystone mit ihr trifft (im Angriff enthalten).

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Mr. Greystone führt zwei Nahkampfangriffe oder zwei Fernkampfangriffe aus.

action.name: Club
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} bis zum Treffer, Reichweite 5 ft., ein Ziel. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) Schaden durch Wucht.

action.name: Hand Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} bis zum Treffer, Reichweite 30/120 Fuß, ein Ziel. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) Stich-Schaden.
